Hero.subtitle_1: Specializing in High-Throughput Systems and Scalable Architecture.
Hero.subtitle_2: Transforming high-fidelity visual logic into scalable system architecture.

LiveActivity.title: Live Activity
LiveActivity.subtitle: Real-time synchronized data from system repositories.

heatmap.title: Contribution Heatmap
heatmap.description: This heatmap visualizes the frequency and intensity of system updates over the last 365 days. Every cell represents a production-ready iteration.

lpk-saitama-dashboard.title: LPK Saitama Dashboard
lpk-saitama-dashboard.problem: Manual management of student data, instructors, and finances led to data duplication and reporting delays.
lpk-saitama-dashboard.system: Centralized dashboard handling the full student lifecycle from enrollment to deployment. Features automated payroll and real-time reporting modules.
lpk-saitama-dashboard.solution: Operational efficiency increased by 80%. Automated data validation reduced errors to near zero. Real-time financial transparency for stakeholders.

lpk-ayaka-website.title: LPK Ayaka Corporate Website
lpk-ayaka-website.problem: Needed a strong digital presence to reach potential students nationwide and build trust with Japanese partners.
lpk-ayaka-website.system: Modern web portal with custom CMS. Optimized for SEO and mobile speed, featuring direct enrollment integration to the admin dashboard.
lpk-ayaka-website.solution: Significant increase in organic traffic and a fully digital enrollment flow.

ai-admin-dashboard.title: AI Integrated Admin Dashboard
ai-admin-dashboard.problem: High admin workload due to repetitive tasks like daily data recap and initial student data analysis.
ai-admin-dashboard.system: Smart dashboard integrating AI for automated daily recaps, data anomaly detection, and a virtual assistant for task management.
ai-admin-dashboard.solution: Reduced repetitive admin workload by 50%, allowing focus on strategic management.

japan-online-course.title: Japan Online Course (Hybrid)
japan-online-course.problem: Physical class capacity limits student expansion. Conventional learning methods lack flexibility.
japan-online-course.system: Hybrid LMS platform supporting 'bypass' and regular systems. Features real-time online exams, progress tracking, and digital material management.
japan-online-course.solution: Expansion of student reach without geographical limits. Flexible learning methods increase material retention.

Analytics.title: System Analytics
Analytics.subtitle: Quantifying logic, intensity, and technical patterns over time. Because if it's not measurable, it's not observable.

Projects.title: Case Studies
Projects.subtitle: System-driven decomposition of real-world problems. No prototypes—only production-grade assets and architectural depth.

About.title: Engineering Philosophy
About.quote: "Logic is the foundation, but systems are the execution. A great engineer builds both."

mindset.title: The System-Oriented Mindset
mindset.desc1: Based in Yogyakarta, I am a **System Builder** and Architect at the crossroads of precise visual logic and scalable engineering.
mindset.desc2: I am not just a Problem Solver, I am a **Builder**. I don't just fix code, I create systems from scratch—engineering the bridge between business vision and technical reality.

values.title: Core Operating Values
values.subtitle: The principles that govern every line of code I push.

system_first.title: System First
system_first.desc: I don't just write code; I design systems. Every component must justify its existence in the broader architecture.

decomposition.title: Decomposition
decomposition.desc: Breaking complex problems into atomic, manageable services is the core of sustainable engineering.

measurability.title: Measurability
measurability.desc: If a solution is not measurable, its success is purely subjective. I rely on data to drive architectural decisions.

Try.title: System Trial
Try.subtitle: Don't take my word for it. Initiate a trial connection to see the architecture in motion. All environments are sandboxed.

security_note.title: Security Note
security_note.desc: Persistent access requires an authorized PEM key. Contact for administrative credentials if deep structural auditing is required.

terminal.pii_warning: This environment contains sensitive PII data. Direct trial is disabled for public users. Request a personalized walkthrough.

lpk-demo.title: LPK Engine Console
lpk-demo.desc: Direct interactive access to the management system core. View how atomic transactions are handled in real-time.

analytics-demo.title: Analytics Data Stream
analytics-demo.desc: Raw WebSocket stream of GitHub events being processed by the system dashboard.

crm-demo.title: CRM Pipeline Sandbox
crm-demo.desc: A sandboxed environment to test the multi-tenant CRM orchestration logic.

CTA.title: Ready to see what I've built?
CTA.subtitle: Explore interactive demos, dive into case studies, or check out my live GitHub activity.
